mapper.select: SELECT co_number, number, user_id, content, DATE_FORMAT(co_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as coDate , co_group, co_ord, co_depth FROM comment where number = #{number} order by co_group DESC, co_ord ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (number,user_id,content,co_date,co_group,co_ord,co_depth) VALUES (#{number},#{userId},#{content},NOW(),(SELECT IFNULL(MAX(co_number),0)+1 FROM comment co),0,0)
